title: As Ukraine tensions mount, Putin says Russia has 'every right' to 'react harshly to unfriendly steps'
content:
1. As Ukraine tensions mount, Putin says Russia has 'every right' to 'react harshly to unfriendly steps'  CNN
  2. Putin says Russia has 'nowhere to retreat' over Ukraine  Yahoo News
  3. Putin Makes New Threats As Russia-Ukraine Tensions Grow  NBC News
  4. Putin warns of possible military response over ‘aggressive’ Nato  The Guardian
  5. Putin blames West for tensions, demands security guarantees  Associated Press
contentSnippet:
As Ukraine tensions mount, Putin says Russia has 'every right' to 'react harshly to unfriendly steps'  CNN
Putin says Russia has 'nowhere to retreat' over Ukraine  Yahoo News
Putin Makes New Threats As Russia-Ukraine Tensions Grow  NBC News
Putin warns of possible military response over ‘aggressive’ Nato  The Guardian
Putin blames West for tensions, demands security guarantees  Associated Press

localize.title: ウクライナの緊張が高まる中、プーチンはロシアには「非友好的な措置に厳しく反応するあらゆる権利」があると発言。
随着乌克兰紧张局势的加剧，普京称俄罗斯 "完全有权 "对 "不友好的步骤作出严厉的反应
隨着烏克蘭緊張局勢的加劇，普京稱俄羅斯 "完全有權 "對 "不友好的步驟作出嚴厲的反應
